data.name: Wayward Soundtrack: Volume Alpha
data.detailed_description:
Wayward Soundtrack: Volume Alpha contains all the original tracks from the game, composed and produced by Austin Dhillon in September of 2011 and released as part of Wayward Alpha 1.5 on September 15, 2012.

Since then, many people have remarked at the haunting beauty and sometimes chilling atmosphere showcased in the songs; a perfect fit for the survival aspect of Wayward.

Track Listing


Shipwrecked - 3:35
Darker World - 4:19
The First Spark - 2:51
Nomad's Heart Beat - 3:11
The Wild Born - 3:02
Night Owl - 4:09
Savage - 3:12
Underworld - 3:58
Shudder Sounds - 4:53

All tracks are provided in .mp3 format at a 320kbps bitrate. You can play the soundtrack via the Steam client from inside the "Music" section in your library, or externally by navigating to the soundtrack folder within the Wayward Steam folder.

Purchasing this soundtrack directly supports Austin Dhillon.
